author: .paulharris
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/357
moving states endpoint - It looks like the general consensus so far is that if we move states endpoint we move all of it, but I'd like to get a decision on whether we actually move it.
I'm for moving it, 
<@449019668296892420> is basically against moving the whole thing (just ssz), need more people's opinions on it please.
<@308223150725005322> was the original proposer so I'll take that as a 'for' unless he'd like to change his opinion.
There was a lot of strong opinion out of band.
